subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Ride On Curlin was not coveted by many bidders as a yearling in 2012, but under the trainer Billy Gowan, he has developed into a threat to win the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
snippet: Ride On Curlin was not coveted by many bidders as a yearling in 2012, but under the trainer Billy Gowan, he has developed into a threat to win the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
